None.Name: Superpig
None.Description: Activate to make QueekQueek become Super Pig. He then will fly faster, deal 85% more and take 50% less damage.Also allow him to do ranged attack.

Extra.en:
Once Superpig is activated,  QueekQueek gains the following abilities,  along with the passive speed,  damage and damage absorbtion bonuses stated by Superpig:
Attack, Pitchfork of Doom: Every 4 seconds,  unit uses its pitchfork to blast the rays of doom at an enemy dealing 106 damage.
Active Ability, Make a Runner: Deep down in his heart QueekQueek hasn't changed a bit,  so his teleport ability may come in handy of things get too messy. Activate to teleport him to any friendly entity on the current map. Reusable every 20s.
